item.title: curl 常见用法
item.description: 在 Linux/unix 中，curl 是最常用到的 web 调试工具。Bite Size Networking 有一张漫画详细地解释了 curl 的参数。 请求一个地址 curl https://httpbin.org/anyting { "args": {}, "data": "", "files": {}, "form": {}, "headers": { "Accept": "*/*", "Host": "httpbin.org", "User-Agent": "curl/7.64.1" }, "json": null, "method": "GET", "origin": "11*.*9.3*.72, 11*.*9.3*.72", "url": "https://httpbin.org/anything" } 可见 curl 的默认 User-Agent 为 curl 加版本号，可以通过识别此标记特定地针对 curl 返回适合终端查看的内容比如 ip.sb 发送 GET 请求 curl -X GET https://httpbin.org/anything { "args": {}, "data": "", "files": {}, "form": {}, "headers": { "Accept": "*/*", "Host": "httpbin.
